page.title: 03FRISKNEY ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Most recreational activities take place in the Village Hall especially in the winter. The Hall is in use most days. Toddlers Group-upto 3 yrs.-weekly. Playgroup-3&4 yr. olds-twice weekly. Friskney Aristocrats Majorettes Jazz Band has had many individual and group successes in the East Midlands Area. Red Cross Cadets meet weekly in the school for instruction and practical nursing work. Youth Club members meet weekly. Derby & Joan Club meets weekly for companionship and card games and has many outings. The popular and active Women's Institute has speakers, competitions, outings and plays an active role in village life. Mobile library van visits fortnightly.
